subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Lance Stephenson, the tournament’s most valuable player, scored 16 points and grabbed 14 rebounds Sunday to lead Abraham Lincoln of Brooklyn to an 86-67 victory against Holy Cross of Queens.
snippet: Lance Stephenson, the tournament’s most valuable player, scored 16 points and grabbed 14 rebounds Sunday to lead Abraham Lincoln of Brooklyn to an 86-67 victory against Holy Cross of Queens.
